AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:oa="http:/ /www.openapplications.org/oagis" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/><xsl:param name="_Input2"/><xsl:variable name="Input_Drv_WebMapper_xml_src_layout1" select="saxonJavaMappingTransformation:decryptInput($_class ,$_Input1)"/><xsl:variable name="Input_Drv_WebMapper_xml_src_layout1_instance1" select="saxonJavaMappingTransformation:decryptInput($_class ,$_Input2)"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:template match="/"><EmployeeRecord><xsl:for-each select = "$Input_Drv_WebMapper_xml_src_layout1/Employee"><EmpID><xsl:call-template name="Drv_valueMap"><xsl:with-param name="param" select="EmployeeID"/></xsl:call-template></EmpID><FName><xsl:value-of select="FirstName"/></FName><EmpFullName><xsl:value-of select="saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass:invokeREST( 'https://vishugoel.com','GET','','','text/html','' ,'' ,'')" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass="java:MapperUtilityClass"/></EmpFullName><Sex><xsl:value-of select="Gender"/></Sex><MobileNo><xsl:value-of select="globalMethod:CallStoredProcedure($varConn,$_class,$_identifier,$_subject, 'Drv_Strored_Procedure' ,concat('{',concat('"input_val":"',EmployeeID,'"'),'}'))" xmlns:globalMethod="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor"/></MobileNo><Town><xsl:value-of select="concat( City,State)"/></Town></xsl:for-each></EmployeeRecord><xsl:result-document href="{$_repositoryPath}/output_2"><EmployeeRecord><EmpFullName><xsl:value-of select="saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass:invokeREST( 'https://vishugoel.com','GET','','','text/html','' ,'' ,'')" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass="java:MapperUtilityClass"/></EmpFullName></EmployeeRecord></xsl:result-document><xsl:value-of select="globalmethod:processMultipleTargetSaxon($_class,$_repositoryPath,'output_2')" xmlns:globalmethod= "java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MultipleTargetSaxon" /></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
